channel.title: When Accusing one of Theft
channel.description: If you think someone is stealing someone else's work, do *not* be the hero and try to tell them off for it. In most cases, you and the person who is 'stealing the work' will be equally punished, so don't try it. Instead, report the person with proof that they are stealing and/or pm a moderator. You do not get special privileges to flame/spam someone even if they are breaking the rules. Bear this in mind the next time you think someone is stealing someone else's work.

item.title: When Accusing one of Theft
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

If you think someone is stealing someone else’s work, do not be the hero and try to tell them off for it. In most cases, you and the person who is ‘stealing the work’ will be equally punished, so don’t try it. Instead, report the person with proof that they are stealing and/or pm a moderator. You do not get special privileges to flame/spam someone even if they are breaking the rules. Bear this in mind the next time you think someone is stealing someone else’s work.
